content: Chinese drama produced in SingaporeThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Baby Blues" Singaporean TV series – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2025)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Baby Blues** ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 谁家母鸡不生蛋; [pinyin](/wiki/Pinyin): **shéi jiā mǔ jī bù shēng dàn**, lit "Whose hen doesn't lay eggs?") is a Chinese drama produced in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) and broadcast in 2005. ## Cast - [Chen Liping](/wiki/Chen_Liping) as Chen Qiaohua - [Xie Shaoguang](/wiki/Xie_Shaoguang) as Lan Haishen - Le Yao as Xiao Yao - [Mimi Chu](/wiki/Mimi_Chu) as Liu Fengping - [Michelle Chong](/wiki/Michelle_Chong) as Lan Shanhu - [Chen Hanwei](/wiki/Chen_Hanwei) as Jiang Weijie - Angel Hou as Chen Qiaoyun - [Jin Yinji](/wiki/Jin_Yinji) as Yang Shuilian - [Allan Wu](/wiki/Allan_Wu) - [Joey Swee](/wiki/Joey_Swee) - Rachell Ng Ting Yi ## Accolades YearCeremonyAwardNomineesResultRef2005[Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards_2005)[Young Talent Award](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Young_Talent)Rachell Ng Ting Yi 黄莛贻Nominated[Best Theme Song](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Theme_Song)"路"Nominated - *Baby Blues* (English) - Official website (Chinese) This drama television program–related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This Singaporean television-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Baby Blues (Singaporean TV series)
